title: Bib
description: three frogs on PL side and two on PR shoulder; no buttons; collar is pounded indigo with scrolled applique in pink and blue; bright blue damask main body has two duck and scroll appliques in front; scroll only in back; armholes bound in applique and red and green braid; front and back have rows of purple and white braid bordered in multicolor applique stripes; lined in black
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
